info.name: BIG-IP Next Access - BIG-IP Next CM API s

item.name: BIG-IP Next Workflows - with Central Manager

body.raw:
{
  "name": "{{app_name}}",
  "set_name": "Examples",
  "template_name": "http",
  "type": "FAST",
  "description": "",
  "parameters": {
    "pools": [
      {
        "loadBalancingMode": "round-robin",
        "loadBalancingRatio": 10,
        "monitorType": [
          "http"
        ],
        "servicePort": {{example_web_port}},
        "application_name": "{{app_name}}",
        "poolName": "pool_{{app_name}}"
      }
    ],
    "virtuals": [
      {
        "FastL4_idleTimeout": 600,
        "FastL4_looseClose": true,
        "FastL4_looseInitialization": true,
        "FastL4_resetOnTimeout": true,
        "FastL4_tcpCloseTimeout": 43200,
        "FastL4_tcpHandshakeTimeout": 43200,
        "TCP_idle_timeout": 60,
        "UDP_idle_timeout": 60,
        "accessAdditionalConfigurations": " ",
        "enable_FastL4": false,
        "enable_HTTP2_Profile": false,
        "enable_TCP_Profile": false,
        "enable_TLS_Client": true,
        "authenticationMode": "require",
        "authenticationTrustCA": "ADDC_CA",
        "trustCACertificate": "ADDC_CA",
        "enable_TLS_Server": false,
        "enable_UDP_Profile": false,
        "enable_snat": true,
        "snat_addresses": [],
        "snat_automap": true,
        "enable_WAF": false,
        "enable_Access": true,
        "accessPolicyEnum": "{{psp_policy_name}}",
        "enable_iRules": false,
        "virtualPort": {{vip_port2}},
        "pool": "pool_{{app_name}}",
        "virtualName": "vs_{{app_name}}",
        "certificatesEnum": "self_demo.f5.com"
      }
    ],
    "application_name": "{{app_name}}",
    "application_description": "{{app_name}}"
  }
}

{
  "name": "{{app_name}}",
  "set_name": "Examples",
  "template_name": "http",
  "type": "FAST",
  "description": "",
  "parameters": {
				"application_description": "",
				"application_name": "{{app_name}}",
				"enable_Global_Resiliency": false,
				"pools": [],
				"virtuals": [
					{
						"FastL4_idleTimeout": 600,
						"FastL4_looseClose": true,
						"FastL4_looseInitialization": true,
						"FastL4_pvaAcceleration": "full",
						"FastL4_pvaDynamicClientPackets": 1,
						"FastL4_pvaDynamicServerPackets": 0,
						"FastL4_resetOnTimeout": true,
						"FastL4_tcpCloseTimeout": 43200,
						"FastL4_tcpHandshakeTimeout": 43200,
						"InspectionServicesEnum": [],
						"TCP_idle_timeout": 60,
						"UDP_idle_timeout": 60,
						"accessPolicyEnum": "{{psp_policy_name}}",
						"allow_networks": [],
						"ciphers": "DEFAULT",
						"ciphers_server": "DEFAULT",
						"enable_Access": true,
						"enable_FastL4": false,
						"enable_HTTP2_Profile": false,
						"enable_InspectionServices": false,
						"enable_SsloPolicy": false,
						"enable_TCP_Profile": false,
						"enable_TLS_Client": true,
						"enable_TLS_Server": false,
						"enable_UDP_Profile": false,
						"enable_WAF": false,
						"enable_allow_networks": false,
						"enable_iRules": false,
						"enable_mirroring": true,
						"enable_snat": true,
						"iRulesEnum": [],
						"multiCertificatesEnum": [
							{
								"clientTlsName": "clientTLS",
								"ecdsaCertificate": "",
								"rsaCertificate": "self_demo.f5.com",
								"sniDefault": true,
								"sniServers": []
							}
						],
						"pool": "",
						"snat_addresses": [],
						"snat_automap": true,
						"tls_c_1_1": false,
						"tls_c_1_2": true,
						"tls_c_1_3": false,
						"tls_s_1_2": true,
						"tls_s_1_3": false,
						"trustCACertificate": "ADDC_CA",
						"virtualAddress": "10.1.10.160",
						"virtualName": "vs_{{app_name}}",
						"virtualPort": 443
					}
				]
  }
}
